21.Country of Tax Residence in India onl.label: 21.Country of Tax Residence in India only and not in any other country or territory outside India*

My / Our Credit Exposure.i): Total Credit exposure Rs.5 Crores or more
My / Our Credit Exposure.iv): Customer willing to have operative CA with SBI
My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our request: I/We willing to have an Operative Current Account with SBI

My / Our Credit Exposure.i): Total Credit exposure Rs. 5 Crore or more
My / Our Credit Exposure.ii): SBI exposure 10% or more (or) Exposure 10% or less
My / Our Credit Exposure.iii): Customer having CC/OD Account with any Bank, which may or may not include SBI.
My / Our Credit Exposure.iv): Customer NOT willing to have operative CA with SBI
My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our request: I/We am willing to have a *collection account with SBI.

My / Our Credit Exposure.i): Total Credit exposure Rs. 5 Crores or more
My / Our Credit Exposure.ii): SBI exposure less than 10% with CC/OD facility and is the highest amongst all the lenders.
My / Our Credit Exposure.iii): No other bank has exposure 10% or more
My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our request: I/We willing to have an Operative Current Account with SBI.

My / Our Credit Exposure.i): Total Credit exposure Rs. 5 Crores or more
My / Our Credit Exposure.ii): SBI exposure 10% or more without CC/OD
My / Our Credit Exposure.iii): SBI is one of the lenders.
My / Our Credit Exposure.iv): Customer having CCOD with another Bank
My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our request: I/We am willing to have a *collection account with SBI.

My / Our Credit Exposure.i): Total credit exposure Rs.5 crores or more but less than Rs.50 crore, without CC/OD exposure from any Bank
My / Our Credit Exposure.ii): SBI is one of lending Bank
My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our request: I/We am willing to have an Operative Current Account with SBI

My / Our Credit Exposure.i): Total credit exposure Rs.5 crore or more but less than Rs.50 crore, without CC/OD exposure from any Bank
My / Our Credit Exposure.ii): SBI is not one of lending Bank
My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our request: I/We am willing to have a *collection account with SBI.

My / Our Credit Exposure.i): Total credit exposure Rs. 50 crores or more without CC/OD exposure from any Bank
My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our request: I/We am willing to have Current account (under the prescribed Escrow mechanism) / *collection account with SBI (strike whichever not applicable). I understand that Current account can be opened/ maintained with the escrow managing bank only.

Declaration for Opening/Continuing Curre.Notes: Name of the Customer field is not populated in the provided text.

My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our Credit Exposure: Accounts for real estate projects mandated under Section 4(2) I (D) of the Real Estate (Regulation and Development) Act, 2016 for thepurpose of maintaining 70% of advance payments collected from the home buyers.

Nodal or escrow accounts of payment aggregators/prepaid payment instrument issuers for specific activities as permitted by Department of Payments and Settlement Systems (DPSS), Reserve Bank of India under Payment and Settlement Systems Act, 2007.
Accounts for settlement of dues related to debit card / ATM card / credit card issuers / acquirers.
My / Our Credit Exposure.Documents: As specified by RBI / relevant regulation

My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our Credit Exposure: Accounts for the purpose of IPO/NFO/FPO/ share buyback /dividend payment/ issuance of commercial papers/ allotment of debentures/gratuity, etc. which are mandated by respective statutes or regulators and are meant for specific /limited transactions only.
My / Our Credit Exposure.Documents: As mandated by respective statutes or regulators

My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our Credit Exposure: Accounts for payment of taxes, duties, statutory dues, etc. opened with banks authorized to collect the same, for borrowers of such banks which are not authorized to collect such taxes, duties, statutory dues, etc.

My / Our Credit Exposure.Documents: As mandated by respective statutes or regulators

My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our Credit Exposure: Current accounts which are stipulated under various statues and instructions of other regulator/regulatory department (Give details of such regulations and attach regulation copy(ies)
My / Our Credit Exposure.Documents: As mandated by respective statutes or regulators

My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our Credit Exposure: To open a current account for project specific facilities like Term Loan/Lease Rental Discounting (LRD) term loan for receiving/monitoring cash flows of a specific project, I / We have not availed any CC/OD facility for that specific project. Give details and attach relevant proofs (FAQ 11 of RBI Circular dated 14.12.2020). I We undertake to ensure that cash flows will be coming in this account are from that specific project only.
My / Our Credit Exposure.Documents: Documents established the claim of customer and Annexure ver 3 (V-A)

My / Our Credit Exposure.My / Our Credit Exposure: To open current accounts for borrowers having credit facilities only from NBFCs/FIs/co-operative banks/ non-bank institutions. Give details and attach relevant proofs (FAQ12 of RBI Circular dated 14.12.2020).
Accounts of All India Financial Institutions (AIFIs), viz., EXIM Bank, NABARD, NHB, and SIDBI
Accounts opened under specific instructions of Central Government and State Governments
